rows.label: qst202509_msg0001
rows.name:
Please wait! That Blade
is to wait outside...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202509_msg0002
rows.name: Are you referring to me?

rows.label: qst202509_msg0003
rows.name: I am.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0004
rows.name:
But KOS-MOS Re: is one
of our companions...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202509_msg0005
rows.name:
That Blade is too dangerous.
I cannot allow her an audience
with His Majesty.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0006
rows.name:
That is an excess of caution.
Please let her pass.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0007
rows.name: Emperor Nefer?!

rows.label: qst202509_msg0008
rows.name:
But, during the previous
battle, this Blade...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202509_msg0009
rows.name: It is fine.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0010
rows.name:
If not for her actions, the damage
would have been far greater.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0011
rows.name: And her Driver is a reliable person.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0012
rows.name: There is no need for concern.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0013
rows.name: Now, let her through.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0014
rows.name: Understood!

rows.label: qst202509_msg0015
rows.name: My apologies for the discourtesy.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0016
rows.name:
It seems that King Serich's
business and the recent
artificial Blade attack...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202509_msg0017
rows.name: are somehow related. Could you explain?

rows.label: qst202509_msg0018
rows.name:
I see. So the artificial
Blades have gone berserk...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202509_msg0019
rows.name:
Then the artificial Blades that
attacked us earlier were the same?

rows.label: qst202509_msg0020
rows.name:
Yes. It is presumed they have
similarly lost their command
structure and are running wild.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0021
rows.name:
At present, the Divine Beasts of
Superbia, Luxuria, and Invidia are
gathered near the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0022
rows.name:
It's possible that the berserk artificial Blades
that Iira released at the World Tree will attack
the surrounding three nations, causing damage.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0023
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Hmm, I understand the situation.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0024
rows.name:
For now, the damage has been
minimal, but this is not
something we can ignore.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0025
rows.name:
We will cooperate with Luxuria and
Invidia to devise a countermeasure.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0026
rows.name: Thank you very much.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0027
rows.name: There is no need for thanks.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0028
rows.name:
Compared to your hardships,
this is nothing.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0029
rows.name:
Please leave this to us
and focus on what you must
do for your own sake.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0030
rows.name: Yes, sir! Then, we will take our leave.
